scripts.build-mobile: next build && next export && npx cap sync && cd android && ./gradlew assemblerelease && cd ../
scripts.android: next build && next export && npx cap sync && npx capacitor run android --livereload --external --open
scripts.electron: next build && next export && npx cap sync && npx cap add @capacitor-community/electron && npx cap open @capacitor-community/electron
